transactions.title: Transactions Help
transactions.description: View, filter, and categorize all your imported transactions.
steps: Use filters to narrow down transactions by date, category, or amount
Click on a transaction to view details and edit
Use bulk actions to categorize multiple transactions at once
Toggle transfer visibility to focus on spending or see all movements
tips: Hold Shift while clicking a filter to exclude instead of include
Use the search bar to find transactions by merchant or description
Click column headers to sort transactions

budgets.title: Budgets Help
budgets.description: Set spending limits and track your progress against them.
steps: Click 'New Budget' to create a budget for a bucket, occasion, or account
Set monthly or yearly limits
Monitor the progress bar to see how much you've spent
Enable rollover to carry unused budget to the next period
tips: Budgets turn yellow at 80% and red at 100%
Click on a budget to see detailed spending breakdown

dashboard.title: Dashboard Help
dashboard.description: Get a quick overview of your financial health with customizable widgets.
steps: Use date range selector to view different time periods
Click 'Manage' to show/hide widgets
Drag widgets to reorder them
Create multiple dashboards for different views
tips: Click on chart elements to drill down into transactions

import.title: Import Help
import.description: Import transactions from your bank's CSV, QIF, QFX, or OFX files.
steps: Select the file from your bank's export
Choose the account (required for duplicate detection)
Preview the transactions before importing
Confirm to add transactions to your records
tips: Use batch import for multiple files at once

admin.title: Admin Help
admin.description: Manage tags, view import history, and monitor system health.
steps: Use tabs to navigate between different admin sections
Create and organize tags for categorization
View import history and statistics
Monitor system health metrics
tips: Delete unused tags to keep your categories clean
Check the Health tab for performance metrics

tools.title: Tools Help
tools.description: Set up automation rules for categorizing transactions.
steps: Create category rules to auto-assign tags based on merchant or description
Set up merchant aliases to normalize messy bank names
Detect and link internal transfers
Save filters for quick access to common views
tips: Rules are applied in priority order
Test rules before applying to see which transactions match
